name: Rucksack Bag
description:
Rucksack + Detachable Day Pack & Rain Cover Army Green
  • Hard fibre support in the back along with aluminium rod provides a strong internal frame
  • Extra soft breathable cushioning on the back provides easy air flow while walking for long hours.
  • 8 Utility straps to wrap additional items (sleeping bag, mat, camping equipment) on the sides, bottom and top
  • Elastic cords and hooks on the day pack to hold mountaineering gear and additional emergency items
  • Double layered strong fabric at the bottom provides durability for rough usage and carrying excess load
  • Base Pads on the bottom protects from rough terrain

Product Details

  • CAPACITY 80 Litres (Including Detachable Day Pack)
  • FRAME Internal frame with hard fibre support and aluminum rod
  • USAGE Ideal for long duration hikes lasting more than 15 days and for carrying luggage on motorcycles and cars; Army Grade
  • RAIN COVER Included inside the Velcro pocket at the base of the rucksack
  • FABRIC MATERIAL 250 GSM Water-Repellant PU Coated Polyester
  • BUCKLE MATERIAL Delrin
  • WEBBING MATERIAL Polypropylene
  • DIMENSIONS 31 inch X 14 inch X 11 inch (When fully filled)
  • WEIGHT 2.3 kg
